author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Try to address wrong SubDetId in some cases for HCAL simulation

#### PR validation:

Compared the parameters read in for HCAL simulation with DDD and DD4hep using cfg's in Geometry/HcalCommonData

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx333 Try to address wrong SubDetId in some cases
